title: Battle Cats Tier List
description: This is the ultimate Battle Cats tier list. It includes the best cats in every rarity, from S Tier to C Tier. Whether you're a beginner or a pro, this tier list will help you choose the right cats for your needs.
heading: Battle Cats Tier List
introText: This is the ultimate Battle Cats tier list. It includes the best cats in every rarity, from S Tier to C Tier. Whether you're a beginner or a pro, this tier list will help you choose the right cats for your needs.

data.itemDescription: Mitama is a powerful anti-alien Uber that can deal massive damage to all Alien enemies. She is also immune to Alien shockwaves, making her a valuable asset in any Alien stage
Jizo is a spammable anti-red Uber that can quickly overwhelm red enemies. He is also very cheap, making him a great choice for early game and midgame players
Gabriel is a powerful anti-angel Uber that can deal massive damage to all Angel enemies. He is also immune to Angel shockwaves, making him a valuable asset in any Angel stage
Amaterasu is a powerful anti-traitless Uber that can deal massive damage to all traitless enemies. She is also immune to traitless shockwaves, making her a valuable asset in any traitless stage
Zeus is a powerful anti-floating Uber that can deal massive damage to all floating enemies. He is also immune to floating shockwaves, making him a valuable asset in any floating stage
Ururun is a powerful anti-black Uber that can deal massive damage to all black enemies. She is also immune to black shockwaves, making her a valuable asset in any black stage
Hades is a powerful anti-metal Uber that can deal massive damage to all metal enemies. He is also immune to metal shockwaves, making him a valuable asset in any metal stage
Poseidon is a powerful anti-zombie Uber that can deal massive damage to all zombie enemies. He is also immune to zombie shockwaves, making him a valuable asset in any zombie stage
Shishiguma is a powerful anti-red Uber that can deal massive damage to all red enemies. He is also immune to red shockwaves, making him a valuable asset in any red stage
Kintaro is a powerful anti-alien Uber that can deal massive damage to all Alien enemies. He is also immune to Alien shockwaves, making him a valuable asset in any Alien stage
Cupid is a powerful anti-red Uber that can deal massive damage to all red enemies. He is also immune to red shockwaves, making him a valuable asset in any red stage
Balrog is a powerful anti-black Uber that can deal massive damage to all black enemies. He is also immune to black shockwaves, making him a valuable asset in any black stage
Zeus is a powerful anti-floating Uber that can deal massive damage to all floating enemies. He is also immune to floating shockwaves, making him a valuable asset in any floating stage
Amaterasu is a powerful anti-traitless Uber that can deal massive damage to all traitless enemies. She is also immune to traitless shockwaves, making her a valuable asset in any traitless stage
Gabriel is a powerful anti-angel Uber that can deal massive damage to all Angel enemies. He is also immune to Angel shockwaves, making him a valuable asset in any Angel stage
Cat God is the weakest Uber in the game. He has low stats and a weak ability. He should not be used under any circumstances
